data.title: Best Jimmy John's in the Area
data.text: Don't get me wrong, all of the Jimmy John's Sandwich Shops in the Daytona Beach area are really good, but I always seem to get a better sandwich at this one. The sandwiches seem bigger, vegetables crisper, the rolls are perfect, plus super friendly staff. So glad this is close to my work.

data.title: lunch while on vacation
data.text: Good food, good service - the staff was willing to customize our order however we asked, and was very fast!

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Actually they are fast, but it's all pre made stuff just waiting for your order. The nice thing is, if you work close by they will deliver to you. I enjoy the ham and cheese or Italian subs. If you do get the turkey ask for the sprouts! Enjoy a fast sub on the go!

data.title: Sandwiches For The Road
data.text: Stopped in JJ's when leaving Daytona for a 6 hour drive, service was friendly and they cut my sandwiches in thirds to make it easier for me to eat while on the highway.  Thanks!

data.title: Always quick and fresh
data.text: Try the unwich, your choice of any sandwich without the bread;  a lettuce wrap; the "Beach" unwich is the best and you save calories; however, the original beach on whole grain is absolutely delicious as well. Enjoy.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: As they say they are freaky fast when it comes to making a sandwich. Reasonable prices and I recommend getting the sprouts on the turkey Tom.

data.title: Delivery for one
data.text: I love the concept they deliver just one sandwich. I ordered a BLT which was only $5.49 added a bottle of water $1.99 a bag of BBQ chips $1.35 delivery $1.00 tip $2.00. $12.40 total. A small sandwich but a filling lunch. My sandwich was exactly as I requested. The bread was good. Sandwich was neat and clean. Not overflowing and hard to eat. Extra tomatoes. I ordered mayo packets and had mayo on my sandwich. Chips were crunchy. Not my favorite BBQ chip but good. Room temp water which is what I like but someone else may be disappointed. Service was good. My only less that positive was that the bacon was served cold.

data.title: Delivery FAIL ! Wrong order, not correction offered.
data.text:
Ordered delivery from  Jimmy Johns Store on Ridgewood ave, #1640
Delivered  quick, but ALL wrong
Spent $16 for sandwich delivery and tip. Sandwich was made ALL WRONG.  Called store, worker said "Sorry". That was it. No replacement offered, nothing. Their employees do not listen or care. Did not eat sandwich. Will not eat there again
Do yourself a favor and try some other places before   giving them your business.

data.title: Favorite sandwich shop
data.text: Love Jimmy John's!  Best bread and you can't get a fresher sandwich.  The Jimmy Chips are a great compliment to the sandwich.  The sizes are large as my hubby and I split a #14 which are the large size.

data.title: Terrible service, dry subs
data.text: The mayo police are stationed here at these Daytona Beach stores. I always ask for extra mayo and Jimmy Johns all over the country give me what I want and its great, but not here. These stores are franchise and have a real problem making your sandwich they way you want it. And if you complain it will go on deaf ears. Do not expect the normal Jimmy Johns experience here, you have been warned.

data.title: If you want a roll with a little meat !
data.text: There are several window hoggie stores which will give me the same.  I want a true Hoggie but you won't find it here go to a mom and pop where you don't pay $7.50 for a roll and wrapping paper.

data.title: Cold subs
data.text: Typical sub shop with cold subs, chips and drinks.  I felt prices were a bit high for what they are offering.

data.title: fast
data.text: well its jimmy johns, and id like to say they are all the same, but some dont care. this one however will do prety much whatever you want with your sandwich, and that folks is worth paying for
